revised_title: The Effect of Plant Growth and Manures on Soil Base Retention
tldr: This study investigates the impact of plant growth and manures on the retention of bases, specifically calcium carbonate, in the soil. The research focuses on the Rothamsted experimental plots, which have been receiving consistent manure treatments for over 50 years. The findings reveal that the application of manures and the process of nitrification contribute to the loss of calcium carbonate in cultivated soils.
